alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Cumberland; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 9:10PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Atlantic, northeastern Cumberland and south central Ocean Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 910 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Vineland, or near Vineland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vineland, Atlantic City, Millville, Cumberland, Pleasantville, Somers Point, Ventnor City, Brigantine, Northfield, Absecon, Margate City, Buena, Egg Harbor City, Laurel Lake, Tuckerton, Weymouth, Estell Manor, Port Republic, Longport and Corbin City. This includes the following highways... Garden State Parkway between mile markers 30 and 51. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 0 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Cumberland; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington
